name: Gate Escape
description:
Gate Escape was developed by Nifty Studios at ToJam Tenticular!

The Team: Jane Hacker, Guy Gonsalves, Nelson Baptista, Sean Liska

Music: Patrick Rainville

Character Concept Art: Anne Bot

CONTROLS

Requires PS3 or XBox Controllers

Move - Left Stick

Use Item - X button (PS3) | A Button (XBox)
